original_text: He also walked in the ways of the house of Ahab, for his mother was his counselor in doing wickedly.
korean_text: 아하시야도 아합의 집 길로 행하였으니 이는 그의 어머니가 꾀어 악을 행하게 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: He also walked in the ways of the house of Ahab
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 아합 집의 길로 행했다

sentences.original_text: for his mother was his counselor in doing wickedly
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어머니는 그가 악을 행하도록 그의 모사였다
